metadata.title: CVE-2024-46739 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:uio_hv_generic: Fix kernel NULL pointer dereference in hv_uio_rescindFor primary VM Bus channels, primary_channel pointer is always NULL. Thispointer is valid only for the secondary channels. Also, rescind callbackis meant for primary channels only.Fix NULL pointer dereference by retrieving the device_obj from the parentfor the primary channel.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
